pages.text: Harder Farther is a mod that makes mobs and farms more difficult, especially when you get further from spawn.$(br2)This is also the mod that adds $(l:core_mods/grim_towers#grimcitadel)Grim Citadels$() which are explained in a seperate section.

Harder Farther makes mobs more difficult the farther you go from spawn.$(br2)The default value is after 1000 blocks, the difficulty increases, with a max difficulty at 30,000 blocks. $(br2)Fiefdom configs have been set at 15,000 blocks if you are looking for a place with max modifiers.

$(br)Mobs are also difficult at different altitudes (6% harder below y-level 32; 9% harder above y-level 99)$(br2)This difficulty affects mobs health (up to 200 extra), movement speed (up to 20% faster), damage (up to 100% boosted), and knockback resistance(up to 95% resistance).

$(br)The advantages of going further is the increased loot drop chance from normal mobs and chests.$(br2)Some loot that might be worth considering the difficulty curve is netherite scraps from mobs, or budding amethyst or even elytra from chests.
